indication.description: Administer to persons who will be travelling internationally.
Administer to persons seeking protection.

observationCode.text: Men who have sex with men

indication.description: Administer to men who have sex with men.
Administer to persons who use illicit drugs.

observationCode.text: Close contact with international adoptee during first 60 days

indication.description: Administer to persons who will have close contact with an international adoptee during the first 60 days.
indication.guidance: The first dose of the 2-dose hepatitis A vaccine series should be administered as soon as adoption is planned, ideally 2 or more weeks before the arrival of the adoptee.

observationCode.text: Working with Hepatitis A virus in research setting

indication.description: Administer to persons who work with Hepatitis A virus in a research setting.
Administer to persons who have an occupational exposure for Hepatitis A
Administer to persons who are experiencing homelessness.
